graph.topic: humans should be able to use animals for their own benefit?

nodes.text: Human being has driven many animals for their personal use
cows and other milch animals for yielding milk from them
other animals such as, horses, cattles and donkeys for farming, agriculture and as a mode of transportation
Many people keep pets like dogs and cats, trained them as service dogs and snuffing dogs which are very helpful to police force and even to some blind peoples
They are kept for security purposes in houses
many farmers and owners exploit animals beyond their limits
cows are often injected by Oxytocin, a hormone which is used to forcibly increase lactation
This in turn, causes lots of discomfort and pain to the cattle
thousand of animals undergo painful suffering or death as a result of scientific research of drugs and various products
Another example of this is cage farming which is against animal rights
Many other practices like, equestrian sport where horses run miles and miles and beaten up by jockeys to make them run more faster
And above all pleasure hunting of defenseless animals
human being should behave as a guardian to animals
Animal rights are meant to set limits on human behavior
manipulation of them should be punished as a serious crime
